about_the_game:
Legendary Tracks is a line of DLCs for Automobilista, celebrating the heritage of classic racing circuits throughout their history. Part 3 is now here: The Hockenheimring.

Host of the German GP for 35 years, the Hockenheimring is one of the tracks with the richest heritage in the world of motorsports. Historically known for its bygone classic layout with long straights through the surrounding forests, the track was reformed for the 2002 German GP, becoming much shorter modern circuit but retaining a high speed, flowing nature perfectly suited for wheel-to-wheel racing with all types of cars.

This pack features 4 distinct versions of this legendary track from 4 different decades - 1977, 1988, 2001 and 2016, along with extra modern layouts (National, Short A & B). The Rallycross layout will be added shortly to the package.

Host of the German GP for 35 years, the Hockenheimring is one of the tracks with the richest heritage in the world of motorsports. Historically known for its bygone classic layout with long straights through the surrounding forests, the track was reformed for the 2002 German GP, becoming much shorter modern circuit but retaining a high speed, flowing nature perfectly suited for wheel-to-wheel racing with all types of cars.

This pack features 4 distinct versions of this legendary track from 4 different decades - 1977, 1988, 2001 and 2016, along with extra modern layouts (National, Short A & B). The Rallycross layout will be added shortly to the package.
name: Legendary Tracks Part 3: Hockenheim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1,8 GHz or 100% compatible CPU
  • Graphics: DX9 Compatible with minumum 1GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 3,4 GHz or 100% compatible CPU
  • Graphics: DX9 Compatible with minumum 2 GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Part 3 of Legendary Tracks has arrived - the classic Hockenheimring from Germany, featuring 4 distinct versions from 4 different decades - 1977, 1988, 2001 plus the modern GP versions and several alternative layouts.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil
